item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Steam Brick: No screen, no controller, just a power button and a USB port (200 points | 46 comments)
2. DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via RL (464 points | 400 comments)
3. SQLook – A free online SQLite database manager with a Windows 2000 interface (29 points | 8 comments)
4. OpenRA – Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era (247 points | 52 comments)
5. An invalid 68030 instruction accidentally allowed the Mac Classic II to boot (137 points | 14 comments)
6. Searching for DeepSeek's glitch tokens (88 points | 2 comments)
7. Every HTML Element (186 points | 75 comments)
8. Wikenigma – an Encyclopedia of Unknowns (75 points | 15 comments)
9. Immutability Changes Everything (2016) [pdf] (51 points | 10 comments)
10. Using AI to develop a fuller model of the human brain (37 points | 8 comments)
11. Base-Rate Blindness (9 points | 1 comment)
12. Bucket Robotics (YC S24) is hiring our first engineer ( | hide)
13. You probably don't need query builders (62 points | 48 comments)
14. Open Heart Protocol (172 points | 73 comments)
15. Show HN: Puck 0.18 adds drag-and-drop for CSS grid and Flexbox (27 points | 2 comments)
16. A FPGA friendly 32 bit RISC-V CPU implementation (83 points | 36 comments)
17. CIA now favors lab leak theory to explain Covid's origins (234 points | 262 comments)
18. Schrödinger: The Nvidia biotech partner Jensen Huang told to "think bigger" (31 points | 10 comments)
19. Fault Tolerance in Tandem Computer Systems (1986)[pdf] (21 points | 13 comments)
20. Dual-Link QR Code Generator (32 points | 12 comments)
21. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (161 points | 62 comments)
22. Tool touted as 'first AI software engineer' is bad at its job, testers claim (30 points | 16 comments)
23. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (229 points | 139 comments)
24. Show HN: Actionate – GitHub Actions for JetBrains IDEs (27 points | 9 comments)
25. Texas Is Enforcing Its State Data Privacy Law. So Should Other States (50 points | 4 comments)
26. Sony ends production of Blu-ray Disc, recordable MiniDisc, and MiniDV media (59 points | 51 comments)
27. M87* One Year Later: Catching the Black Hole's Turbulent Accretion Flow (16 points | 1 comment)
28. OpenAI's o1 Playing Codenames (207 points | 114 comments)
29. The Mythical IO-Bound Rails App (193 points | 53 comments)
30. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (358 points | 137 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
